meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7742.

td.p: Eric Thorpe, a senior at Dartmouth College from Laguna Niguel, California
Hannah Sage, a sophomore at the University of Central Florida from Sarasota, Florida
Thatcher Chonka, a sophomore at the University of Oklahoma from Tulsa, Oklahoma

tr.td: OFFICIAL STATE STUFF
ACTING UP ON TV
ELEMENTARY
SEEING RED
HIT THE BOOKS
THE "GRE"s ARE COMING
